column4: Anyone know how to change resolution on the screen? and the hz? I've tried with the prog in system, but I can only get 1024 and 60hz?
daniels: Error: no write permission for file "/etc/X11/xorg.conf"
i removed the vert blabla and then what?
Then you add the resolution you want, probably to the 24 bit color depth section
where should i type the resolution i want?
near the bottom, where all the other resolutions are
the problem is i can't change the resolution from 640 to anything, after i removed those lines daniels told me to.
Oh, then you want them back
the format? Sure, I'll query you

if you feel like it, you can switch between them now w/ ctrl-alt-=
